publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to see your users' basic profile (name, picture, user name)
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to see your users' basic profile (name, picture, user name)

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to see and update the data you gave it access to, even when users are not currently using the app. This does not give the app any additional permissions.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Maintain access to data that users have given it access to
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to see and update the data you gave it access to, even when users are not currently using the app. This does not give the app any additional permissions.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Maintain access to data that users have given it access to

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign in to the app with their work or school accounts and allows the app to see basic user profile information.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows users to sign in to the app with their work or school accounts and allows the app to see basic user profile information.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Enable Office to call the add-in's web APIs with the same rights as the current user
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Office can act as the user
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Enable Office to call the add-in's web APIs with the same rights as the current user
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Office can act as the user

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections
